zh.doc.Email.640106-2: 通知模板结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。通知模板只能调用同一类型的通知配置服务。
zh.doc.Email.640106-3: 服务器地址支持自定义输入。
zh.doc.Email.640106-6: 支持输入变量，变量格式$
zh.doc.Email.640106-8: 支持录入多个邮箱地址，可填写变量参数。
zh.doc.Email.640106-10: 支持填写带变量的动态模板。变量填写规范示例：$
zh.doc.Email.640106-11: 。填写动态参数后，可对变量的名称、类型、格式进行配置，以便告警通知时填写。

en.doc.Email.640106-2: The notification template combined with notification configuration provides support for alarm message notifications. Notification templates can only call notification configuration services of the same type.
en.doc.Email.640106-3: The server address supports custom input.
en.doc.Email.640106-6: Support input variables and variable formats$
en.doc.Email.640106-8: Support entering multiple email addresses, variable parameters can be filled in.
en.doc.Email.640106-10: Support filling in dynamic templates with variables. Example of variable filling standard:$
en.doc.Email.640106-11: After filling in the dynamic parameters, the name, type, and format of the variables can be configured for filling in during alarm notifications.
